notes:
[Vile Aggregate] is a premium card in two of the top archetypes in the format. Provided your deck is full of colourless creatures, [Vile Aggregate]  is just absurd. It can be a 5/5 trampler for three.

Other than that  [Sludge Crawler] is good in both UB Ingest and BR Devoid, and [Tightening Coils] is a good removal spell.
